page.title: 07Ruan Major Church
page.content: We went to see Ruan Major Church.The church is very isolated.There are only two old cottages near it.This used to be the main church but now Ruan Minor has taken its place.It is mostly in ruins now.The walls and tower are still there but the roof has been taken down because it was dangerous.Most of the windows are smashed except the front one.There is netting to protect it.When the church was left after the Second World War everything was still in it even hymn books.Gradually it began to rot.There are still the remains of the old tiled floor.The font was taken to Ruan Minor and the bell to the Lizard.We read in an old book that in 1868 a thunderstorm damaged a pinnacle on the tower and it had to be pushed down.This left three pinnacles but now there are four.
